result.title: List of NMs
result.description: List of NM to be used within the project and characterization will be compiled based on assessment of the available and most suitable materials. NM Materials (the NM series) deposited in the EC, Joint Research Centre (selected by the OECD Nanomaterials Working Party) and a series of 64 materials (the NRCWE series) available at the NRCWE (Partner 4) will be assessed for suitability for in vivo inhalation and in vitro tracking studies.

result.title: Common monitoring and impact assessment frameworks
result.description:
â€œCommon monitoring and impact assessment frameworkâ€ in form of a written document addressing the following points:
Definition of actions to monitor, monitoring protocols, clearly identified and quantifiable metrics to capture key impacts of demonstration activities, data provision and data protection, methodologies and procedures for impact assessment, detailed project plan for impact assessment and monitoring measures, identification and mitigation of risks connected to impact assessment and monitoring procedures
